title: Indian dialogues for their instruction in that great service of Christ, in calling home their country-men to the knowledge of God, and of themselves, and of Iesus Christ.
author: Eliot, John, 1604-1690.
notes: Attributed to John Eliot by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages faded, stained and tightly bound with slight loss of print; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
